DOC.brief_summary: Randomized clinical outcome study of two rotating hinge knee prosthesis in knee surgery. Hypothesis: No difference in the clinical outcome for 1 year after the operation. Clinical follow-ups at 3, 10, 90 and 360 days after surgery. Measurement of clinical parameters
DOC.brief_title: Outcome EnduRo Versus LINK SL Rotating Hinge Knee
DOC.criteria: rotating hinge knee indicated infection, malignant tumor, rheumatism
